title: It won't let me sign in.
body: So, every time I try to sign in it says that I am using the wrong password/username combination. I've changed my password about three times and it is still doing the same thing but I can log on fine on the site. Help.

replies.body: I wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary, so everything should be okay with your account.  If this is the one you're posting from, I mean.  When you open the launcher, do you have NA selected?  This issue can commonly be caused by being connected to the wrong region.  Let me know!
